features: Travel Luggage with Wheels: With 18.5 x 14 x 9 inches of packing space, this rolling suitcase is the perfect size for any trip; Carry all your essentials without adding unnecessary bulk - this carry-on bag measures 21.5 x 15 x 9.5 inches overall

Durable Design: Designed to withstand wear and tear without compromising on quality or appearance, our spinner luggage features a durable ABS construction and co-molded lift handles with soft rubber hand grips for added comfort

Multi-Directional Spinner Wheels: Provide maximum maneuverability, so you can easily navigate busy airports and small spaces; Each travel suitcase also comes equipped with a premium, push-button steel locking telescopic handle
Expandable Design: This roller suitcase features a variety of internal pockets for easy organization and expands up to 2" to provide additional packing space

10-Year Warranty: Tested to meet stringent standards, our rolling luggage comes with a 10-year warranty against defects in materials and workmanship, so customers can rest easy knowing that their purchase is protected
body.description: SwissGear 8020 Hardside Expandable Luggage with Spinner Wheels is the perfect carry-on luggage for your next trip. This 18-inch suitcase is made of durable ABS and includes co-molded lift handle(s) with soft rubber hand grips for easy maneuverability. The split-case design expands 2" for additional packing space and a variety of internal pockets keep you organized. The eight 360-degree multi-directional spinner wheels and a premium, push-button steel locking telescopic handle make it easy to navigate through the airport. With outside dimensions of 21.5 x 15 x 9.5 inches including wheels and handles, this suitcase offers 18.5 x 14 x 9 inches of packing space. This hardside luggage is perfect for those who need a lightweight and durable suitcase for their travels. The hardshell exterior is designed to protect your belongings from the wear and tear of travel, while the spinner wheels make it easy to move around. The telescopic handle is designed to be comfortable and easy to use, and the internal pockets help you stay organized. Plus, this suitcase comes with a 10 year warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 8020 Expandable Carry-On 18" Luggage Lightweight, strong, and designed for total convenience. The SwissGear 8020 Expandable Hardside Spinner Carry On Luggage makes carry on effortless. Its lightweight ABS exterior and split-case design is further enhanced by elastic tie-down straps on one side and a zippered divider panel with built-in mesh pocket to keep contents in place yet easy to find. A zippered expansion option adds packing space when you need it, and a small, zippered, interior accessory pocket gives you added organizing options. Movement is easy on eight 360-degree spinner wheels led by locking aluminum telescopic handle with push-button release and built-in patented pop-out cup holder that folds up flat when not in use. The co-molded top handle with soft rubber grip is comfortable in the hand and ruggedly durable.

Locking Telescopic Handle With a reinforced push button locking handle with an integrated side and bottom handle, this roller suitcase makes lifting and carrying your luggage easy. Multi-Directional Spinner Wheels Our state-of-the-art in-line wheels incorporate sealed steel ball bearings and are mounted on solid axles in custom-designed, shock-absorbing bushings. They roll smoothly and quietly for miles. Cupholder Feature Only available with the Carry-On version of the 8020 luggage, it is equipped with a convenient cupholder. You will always have a place to rest your beverage during travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These suitcases are great! My son loves the color and they move so smoothly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not good quality
reviews.reviewText: Bought it back on summer only lasted 6 months . Zippers both broke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Zipper on 24” installed backwards
reviews.reviewText: Purchased the 3 set. 18” and 27” appear to function perfectly.24” inside zipper was installed backwards. It is functional but not ideal.I haven’t used the suitcases yet to see how they will handle traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super nice carry-on luggage! Made from a trusted name brand! This carry-on bag seems to be great quality and hold a good amount of items! I love how One side is zippered off so if you are sharing with somebody else, it makes it super easy to separate things.It rolls very smoothly and makes a great carry-on bag! The cupholder is decent as well but make sure the weight is distributed properly so it doesn’t fall over!Would recommend for a nice carry-on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Quick Getaways
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot for my job and do a lot of overnight trips on the weekend as well. I hate checking my bags at the airport and have been in the market for a new and improved carry on luggage, so when I saw this pop up in my feed, I knew this was going to be the perfect replacement for me.The luggage itself is perfect. It is a perfect size to fit in overhead bins on an airplane. The handle is sturdy and strong. It does not feel flimsy like it would break unless it was really damaged badly. The wheels turn three hundred sixty degrees which is something that I always need because when I am walking, I like to wheel my luggage upright. Overall, good quick trip luggage to get around. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice carry on luggage
reviews.reviewText: This bag maximizes the space available within the airline carry on size limitations. It takes up the entire 22x14x9 limits including wheels and handles. It includes a zipper that goes around the entire outside of the luggage that will allow it to expand approximately 1 more inch presumably for when you are not using it as a carry on or when the airline isn't paying close attention to the size.It has a divider in the center with zippered pockets to keep your clothing and items organized during your trip. Also included is a built-in cup holder which may come in very handy during long airport waits. The wheels roll nicely even on carpet and the telescoping handle extends more than 20 inches beyond the top of the luggage for easy pulling without needing to bend over. I haven't used it on a trip yet, but I see no quality issues with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worse piece of luggage I have ever owned
reviews.reviewText: I just traveled back from Athens Greece and after using this piece of luggage only once, it completely fell apart, and broke during loading of the plane. The airport did not help, but the luggage did not hold together, and I lost roughly $500 in clothing. I do not recommend purchasing this piece if you plan on actually using it to travel with. I am very disappointed and dissatisfied
